Extrusion: Extrude the three sketched faces and scale the prism by a factor of 0.4667. The prism has a height of 0.6667, a length of 0.4667, and a width of 0.4667. Extrusion: Extrude each sketch by a depth of 0.0833 opposite to the normal. Each cylinder has a height of 0.0833, and a diameter of 0.0266. Perform a JoinFeatureOperation to combine the cylinders into a single solid body.</description>
